AT.name: Runbow
AT.description: Get ready to runbow! Runbow ist ein fantastisches, rasantes und packendes Spiel für 1 bis 9 Spieler. Plattformen und Hindernisse erscheinen und verschwinden wieder, während die Hintergrundfarbe wechselt. Wenn du also etwas nicht sehen kannst, existiert es auch nicht.

AU.name: Runbow
AU.description: Runbow is a fast-paced action party game for up to 9 players! The world changes with each swipe of the background colour and if you can't see something it doesn't exist! Players can go head-to-head in Run, Arena, King of the Hill, and ColourMaster, or hone their skills on their own in Adventure or The Bowhemoth. • Local and Online Nine-player Multiplayer – The biggest couch-multiplayer experience to come to Wii U™, ever! • Six Great Game Modes – Challenge friends in King of the Hill, Arena, Run, or ColourMaster, or dominate Runbow’s colorful world on your own or co-operatively in Adventure and Bowhemoth. • One Master to Rule Them All – Play against friends in ColourMaster mode, where challengers race against one malevolent ColourMaster who controls the colors and obstacles in the level with the Wii U™ GamePad.

BG.name: Runbow
BG.description: Runbow is a fast-paced action party game for up to 9 players! The world changes with each swipe of the background colour and if you can't see something it doesn't exist! Players can go head-to-head in Run, Arena, King of the Hill, and ColourMaster, or hone their skills on their own in Adventure or The Bowhemoth. • Local and Online Nine-player Multiplayer – The biggest couch-multiplayer experience to come to Wii U™, ever! • Six Great Game Modes – Challenge friends in King of the Hill, Arena, Run, or ColourMaster, or dominate Runbow’s colorful world on your own or co-operatively in Adventure and Bowhemoth. • One Master to Rule Them All – Play against friends in ColourMaster mode, where challengers race against one malevolent ColourMaster who controls the colors and obstacles in the level with the Wii U™ GamePad.

BE.name: Runbow
BE.description: Préparez-vous à Runbow ! Runbow est un jeu rapide et frénétique pour 1-9 joueurs qui vous donnera envie d'y revenir. Les plateformes et les obstacles apparaissent et disparaissent en fonction de la couleur du fond, donc si vous ne pouvez pas voir quelque chose, c'est qu'elle n'existe pas.

ES.name: Runbow
ES.description: ¡Prepárate para Runbow! Runbow es un juego rápido y frenético para 1-9 jugadores con el que querrás repetir. Plataformas y obstáculos aparecen y desaparecen a medida que cambia el color del fondo; si no ves algo, es que no existe.

IT.name: Runbow
IT.description: Preparati al Runbow! Runbow è un gioco veloce, frenetico, da 1 a 9 giocatori che non ti stancherà mai! Le piattaforme e gli ostacoli appaiono e scompaiono col cambiare del colore di sfondo, quindi se non puoi vederlo significa che non esiste!
